name: Mercenary Operator: Wolves
description:
Mercenary Operator: Wolves is a 2D tactical top-down shooter that puts you into the shoes of a mercenary employed by Wolf, a private military company. Follow the Wolf PMC through their journey across a war-torn African country and elsewhere.

Features

  • Play across several maps with randomized enemies and objectives for lots of replayability.

  • Choose from a variety of different weapons.

  • Customize your character and loadout.
